h2_title: Where to Find the Apramana Bat
h3_title: Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Listen for the sound cue of your attack being deflected, and it will quickly rise up and extend a bladed wing up in the air before slamming it down on you. You can turn the tables with your own deflection (though it will send you sliding back), or dodge to the side and bash it with a Spirit Attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Apramana Bat' and the sub-subsection 'Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Listen for the sound cue of your attack being deflected, and it will quickly rise up and extend a bladed wing up in the air before slamming it down on you. You can turn the tables with your own deflection (though it will send you sliding back), or dodge to the side and bash it with a Spirit Attack.
